caption.p:
Subchronic effect (30 days) of malathion (200 mg / kg BW, po) and / or lavender essential oils (LSEO) (50 mg / kg, PC, OP) on testosterone levels in male mice. Values are expressed as mean ± SEM( n = 12). * Comparison of CTR and other groups ( p 0.05).
# Comparison of M with LSEO group ( p 0.05)
